member.summary: Retruns the brush respect to the input value on numberformat Possible Keys are, ['0'] => denotes the color for zero value ['+'] => denotes the color for positive value ['-'] => denotes the color for negative value ['t'] => denotes the color for Text value ['d'] => denotes the color for Default value
